https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/dXy55JISYOfUKZdpKG1A8yegHzw.jpg As Christmas approaches, a department store worker whose life lacks fulfillment meets her guardian angel, who offers her a chance to change her circumstances by magically transporting her to Christmases past whenever she tries on a new pair of shoes. A Shoe Addict's Christmas
